thread.title: ORCHARD GATEWAY MARKETING GIMMICK POKES FUN AT TEEN'S DEATH?
thread.title_full: ORCHARD GATEWAY MARKETING GIMMICK POKES FUN AT TEEN'S DEATH?

author: farhan
title: ORCHARD GATEWAY MARKETING GIMMICK POKES FUN AT TEEN'S DEATH?
text:
ORCHARD GATEWAY MARKETING GIMMICK POKES FUN AT TEEN'S DEATH? Submitted by farhan on Mon, 27/02/2017 - 8:30am 
I was browsing the Orchard Gateway website on 26 Feb (Sun), and chanced upon this fashion advert ("Against The Norm") of a young man in a flowery shirt upside-down, with his head against the floor. This is featured on the front page, apparently to promote Orchard Gateway's men's fashion offerings at "Men's Zone @L4". http://www.orchardgateway.sg/menszone/index.php Advertisement 
Is it pure coincidence or Orchard Gateway's marketing department trying to be funny with this tongue-in-cheek message? ("step into a new world"?!?) 
I find this ad very distasteful and appalling, as 17-year old Jonathan Chow recently died (24 Feb) from falling from the Level 4 'ledge' at the link-bridge between Orchard Gateway and Orchard Central. 
Concerned friends, shoppers and Singaporeans may raise their concerns to Orchard Gateway@6513 4633. 
Parkour Lee ASS Contributer Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
